name: check-ip-subnet
description: Check if IP belongs to the given subnet

scripts.test-cov: npm run-script lib-cov && COVERAGE=1 mocha -R html-cov -r should test/*.js > coverage.html
scripts.lib-cov: npm run-script clean; eval `which jscoverage || echo ./node-jscoverage/jscoverage` lib lib-cov
scripts.coveralls: npm run-script lib-cov && COVERAGE=1 mocha -R mocha-lcov-reporter -r should test/*.js | coveralls

author: Purpose Industries <dev@purposeindustries.co>
